name: personal-hub-a-customizable-personal-link
title: Personal Hub -  A Customizable Personal Link
desc:
Personal Hub is a modern and fully customizable template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, designed to help users create a stylish and professional personal hub for their links, projects, and online presence.

Whether youâre a developer, creator, or entrepreneur, this template provides a sleek, minimalistic, and responsive interface to showcase your work, social links, and more in a centralized place.
article:
Key Features

â Dark & Light Mode â Seamlessly switch between themes for a better user experience.

â Multi-Language Support â Easily add multiple languages for a global audience.

â Fully Responsive â Optimized for mobile and desktop devices.

â Fast & Lightweight â Built with Astro for high performance and speed.

â Customizable & Extendable â Modify styles, sections, and content with ease.

â Deployed on Vercel â Easy to host and deploy with a single command.


Who Is This For?

  • Developers looking for a simple yet powerful portfolio and link-in-bio page.
  • Content creators who want a centralized hub for all their links.
  • Freelancers and entrepreneurs showcasing their work in a professional way.


Installation & Usage

Setting up Personal Hub is quick and easy:

git clone https://github.com/tedevs0/hub-itsteddydev.git  
cd hub-itsteddydev  
npm install  
npm run dev  

Then open http://localhost:4321 in your browser to customize your hub!

Author

TeddyDev

github.name: hub-itsteddydev
github.description: Personal Hub is a template designed to centralize and organize personal or professional information in one place. This tool allows users to manage and access their data, projects, important links, and more, all from a unified interface.
